alert.note: Alert for Charleston (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 31 at 4:26PM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...DENSE SEA FOG MOVING INLAND ALONG THE CHARLESTON COUNTY COAST... An area of sea fog just off the Charleston County coast is beginning to move slowly inland late this afternoon. The fog will impact areas from Johns Island, James Island and Folly Beach northeast into parts of Downtown Charleston, Mount Pleasant and Isle of Palms. Visibilities will drop to less than 1/4 mile in this fog so motorists should be alert for rapidly changing conditions.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down and leave extra distance ahead of you in case a sudden stop is needed.
